response.body: {"@context":{"skos":"http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#","dc":"http://purl.org/dc/terms/","rdfs":"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#","xsd":"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#"},"@graph":[{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000009","dc:identifier":"homoit0000009","skos:prefLabel":[{"@language":"en","@value":"Adoptive parenthood"},{"@language":"es","@value":"Maternidad adoptiva / Paternidad adoptiva"}],"skos:altLabel":[{"@language":"es","@value":"Maternidad adoptiva"},{"@language":"es","@value":"Paternidad adoptiva"}],"rdfs:comment":[{"@language":"en","@value":"The experience of being an adoptive parent to a child or children. An adoptive parent is the person or persons who become permanent parents through adoption with all the responsibilities therein."},{"@language":"es","@value":"La experiencia de ser madre adoptiva o padre adoptivo de un(a) niño(a) o niños(as). Es la persona o las personas que se convierten en madres o padres permanentes mediante la adopción con todas las responsabilidades que ello implica."}],"skos:broader":{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000914"},"skos:related":[{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000451"},{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000809"}],"skos:hasTopConcept":{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000914"},"dc:replaces":{"@id":"http://homosaurus.org/v2/adoptiveParenthood"},"dc:issued":{"@type":"xsd:date","@value":"2019-05-14"},"dc:modified":{"@type":"xsd:date","@value":"2025-02-23"},"@type":"skos:Concept","skos:inScheme":{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v3"}},{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000809","dc:identifier":"homoit0000809","skos:prefLabel":[{"@language":"en","@value":"LGBTQ+ adoption"},{"@language":"es","@value":"Adopción LGBTQ+"}],"skos:altLabel":[{"@language":"en","@value":"LGBTQ adoption"},{"@language":"es","@value":"Adopción (LGBTQ)"}],"rdfs:comment":[{"@language":"en","@value":"Adoption of a child or children, either by legal or informal processes, by LGBTQ+ people. "},{"@language":"es","@value":"La adopción de un niño o niños, ya sea por procesos legales o informales, por personas word for people who are assigned male at birth who adopt feminine mannerisms; often considered a third gender."},{"@language":"es","@value":"Palabra filipina para personas asignadas al sexo masculino al nacer que adoptan gestos femeninos; a menudo consideradas un tercer género."}],"skos:broader":[{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000322"},{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0001560"}],"skos:related":[{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000023"},{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000101"}],"skos:hasTopConcept":{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000560"},"dc:replaces":{"@id":"http://homosaurus.org/v2/bakla"},"dc:issued":{"@type":"xsd:date","@value":"2019-05-14"},"dc:modified":{"@type":"xsd:date","@value":"2025-02-23"},"@type":"skos:Concept","skos:inScheme":{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v3"}},{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000304","dc:identifier":"homoit0000304","skos:prefLabel":[{"@language":"en","@value":"Second parent adoption"},{"@language":"es","@value":"Adopción por segundo padre"}],"skos:altLabel":[{"@language":"en","@value":"Co-parent adoption"},{"@language":"es","@value":"Adopción co-parental"}],"rdfs:comment":[{"@language":"en","@value":"An adoption process by which a legal child-parent relationship is established by granting the “second” parent the same rights as the “first” parent without the “first” or legal parent relinquishing any parental rights. A second or co-parent adoption can be important for LGBTQ+ parents to protect their parental rights as the relationship of the non-biological parent may not be recognized in some jurisdictions without such an adoption."},{"@language":"es","@value":"Un proceso de adopción mediante el cual se establece una relación legal entre padres e hijos otorgando al “segundo” padre los mismos derechos que al “primer” padre sin que el “primer” padre o padre legal renuncie a ningún derecho de paternidad. Una segunda adopción o una adopción conjunta puede ser importante para que los padres LGBTQ+ protejan sus derechos de paternidad, ya que la relación del padre no biológico puede no ser reconocida en algunas jurisdicciones sin dicha adopción."}],"skos:broader":{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000809"},"skos:related":{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000918"},"skos:hasTopConcept":{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000864"},"dc:replaces":{"@id":"http://homosaurus.org/v2/secondParentAdoption"},"dc:issued":{"@type":"xsd:date","@value":"2019-05-14"},"dc:modified":{"@type":"xsd:date","@value":"2025-02-23"},"@type":"skos:Concept","skos:inScheme":{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v3"}},{"@id":"https://homosaurus.org/v4/homoit0000811","dc:identifier":"homoit0000811","skos:prefLabel":[{"@language":"en","@value":"LGBTQ+ parenthood"},{"@language":"es","@value":"Maternidad y paternidad adoptiva LGBTQ"},{"@language":"es","@value":"Maternidad adoptiva LGBTQ+"},{"@language":"es","@value":"Paternidad adoptiva LGBTQ+"}],"rdfs:comment":[{"@language":"en","@value":"The experiences involved in adoptive parenting, as experienced by LGBTQ+ people."},{"@language":"es","@value":"Las experiencias involucradas en la crianza adoptiva, tal como las viven las personas
